banner.title: Technology company providing software solutions for the Japanese market & globally.
banner.description: A 100% Japanese-invested company with fulfillments as the parent company. With a young team with extensive experience in software design.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Professional website design and development, responsive with modern technology, optimized user experience and high performance

digitalMarketing.title: Digital Marketing
digitalMarketing.description: Comprehensive marketing strategy on digital platforms, enhancing brand recognition and attracting potential customers

startupSolutions.title: Startup Solutions
startupSolutions.description: Comprehensive support for startups from idea to execution, including strategy consulting, product development and investment connections

networkingServices.title: Networking Services
networkingServices.description: Design and deploy enterprise network systems, ensuring stable connections, high security and optimal performance

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Search engine optimization, improving website ranking on Google, increasing organic traffic and customer conversion

appsDevelopment.title: App Development
appsDevelopment.description: Cross-platform mobile and desktop application development, from UI/UX design to system deployment and maintenance

aboutUs.title: About Fumirai
aboutUs.subtitle: Company Profile
aboutUs.lead: FUMIRAI COMPANY LIMITED is a technology company focused on building high-quality software products and services for Japan and global markets.
aboutUs.p1: We bring together a young, passionate team with strong experience in system design, product development, and customer collaboration.
aboutUs.p2: With a customer-first mindset, we provide end-to-end solutions from consulting and UX/UI to development, deployment, and operation.
aboutUs.p3: We continuously learn and improve to deliver sustainable value, transparency, and long-term partnerships.

footer.copyright: FUMIRAI COMPANY LIMITED All Rights Reserved.

recruitmentPage.title: Recruitment
recruitmentPage.subtitle: Join our team and grow your career in the technology field

developer.title: Developer
developer.description: Develop web and mobile applications with modern technology, working in an international environment with Japanese clients.

requirements.skills: Proficient in React, Node.js, TypeScript or similar frameworks
requirements.language: Japanese N3 level or above, or good English communication

benefits.training: Skill training and learning opportunities from experts

tester.title: Tester
tester.description: Ensure product quality through comprehensive testing, accurately detecting and reporting bugs.

requirements.skills: Understanding of test processes, bug tracking and test automation
requirements.teamwork: Ability to work in teams and communicate effectively

benefits.training: Test skills and new tools training
benefits.career: Opportunity to develop into Test Lead or QA Manager

brse.title: BRSE (Bridge System Engineer)
brse.description: Act as a bridge between Japanese clients and development team, analyze requirements and ensure project success.

requirements.experience: 2+ years experience in BRSE or Business Analyst role
requirements.language: Japanese N2 level or above, able to communicate directly with clients
requirements.analysis: Ability to analyze requirements and design solutions

benefits.training: Project management and communication skills training
benefits.career: Opportunity to become Project Manager or Business Analyst

other.title: Other Positions
other.description: We are always looking for new talents in fields such as UI/UX Design, DevOps, Marketing, Sales and many other positions.

requirements.experience: Relevant experience for the applied position
requirements.adaptability: Ability to adapt and learn quickly

benefits.career: Many career advancement and development opportunities
